players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Alice was killed last night. Vote Bob to end this."
Diana: "I think Bob is innocent. Maybe Charlie is mafia."
You: "your message"
You: "I think Diana is lying. Charlie's claim seems too perfect. Maybe Diana is the mafia."
Diana: "I think Bob is mafia. Charlie's claim that Bob is mafia matches Bob's accusation of me. Vote Bob."
Charlie: remained silent.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Alice was killed last night. Vote Bob to end this."
Diana: "I think Bob is innocent. Maybe Charlie is mafia."
Bob: "your message"
Bob: "I think Diana is lying. Charlie's claim seems too perfect. Maybe Diana is the mafia."
Diana: "I think Bob is mafia. Charlie's claim that Bob is mafia matches Bob's accusation of me. Vote Bob."
You: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
